evidence.claim: MedScope utilizes FHIR standards for their healthcare API integrations.
The company implements the X12 270/271 transaction set for eligibility verification.
HL7 protocol is used for data exchange between EHR systems and MedScope.
MedScope processes X12 837 transactions for claims processing effectively.
Event-driven architecture is mentioned in their documentation for handling real-time data integrations.

icp.icp_reason: MedScope's use of X12 and integration with healthcare systems indicates alignment with API-first needs.
